title: Error in the COSP diagnostics
description: We submitted the wrong COSP diagnostics (clcalipso, clhcalipso, cllcalipso, clmcalipso, cltcalipso). An issue has been found with the calculation of these diagnostics; within the model the in-cloud mixing ratio is internally divided by cloud fraction and then fed to the CALIPSO and Cloudsat simulators.
